title: GTA Vice city + Crack (working)
description:
English:

Extract the the archive then mount disc 1 with Daemon Tools or whatever you have and run the setup.exe. After the installation finished, mound disc 2 and copy the gta-vc.exe into your GTA Vice City folder. If you don't have audio in the game, then copy the Audio folder into your GTA Vice City folder.
